thread.title: Huge Arsenal shock: Arsene Wenger tells his players he is leaving the club - report
thread.title_full: Huge Arsenal shock: Arsene Wenger tells his players he is leaving the club - report

title: Huge Arsenal shock: Arsene Wenger tells his players he is leaving the club - report
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Huge Arsenal shock: Arsene Wenger tells his players he is leaving the club - report ARSENE WENGER has told his players he is leaving Arsenal this summer, according to sensational reports in Italy. PUBLISHED: 14:13, Tue, Mar 7, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:15, Tue, Mar 7, 2017 
Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger is out of contract at the end of the season but has been offered a new two-year deal by the club.Wenger has yet to make an announcement on his future but is thought to be considering bring the curtain down on his 21-year tenure at Arsenal.And according to Italian news outlet SNAI, Wenger has informally told the Arsenal dressing room he is off.
